channel.title: Command logs help!
channel.description:
hey everyone, I want to make a log that tells me who did what command. so like this: [code][24:15:10]infinitymagic: help [24:30:24]infinitymagic: funpk[/code]
does anyone knows where to start this? in what file etc...
please help me!
